trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 向 UI 自动化公开 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 创建 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> remains in memory until the associated <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer>之前关联仍保留在内存<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>被销毁。

trans-unit.source: The same instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> is returned from subsequent calls to this method and to calls to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 同一个实例<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer>后续调用此方法与调用返回<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the peer is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A> virtual callback.
trans-unit.target: 对等方的类型由<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>虚拟回调。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> does not implement the callback, no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> is created and this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>不实现回调，则不<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer>创建，并且此方法返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> has not been created by the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement(System.Windows.ContentElement)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />；如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 方法未创建 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement(System.Windows.ContentElement)" />，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key for the element associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 关联的元素的加速键。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 的访问密钥。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The access key for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 的访问密钥。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 的控件类型。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Custom" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Custom" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，该字符串唯一标识与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the automation identifier.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含自动化标识符的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property, and if that isn't set, it's the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 自动化标识符的值是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>属性，如果未设置，它是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> representing the bounding rectangle of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 的边框的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 绑定矩形。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 的子元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 子元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that represents the clickable space that is on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示位于与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 上的可点击空间的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The point that represents the clickable space that is on the element.
trans-unit.target: 表示位于元素上的可点击空间的点。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the clickable point is any point that is within the visible client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that would result in issuing the command that the button represents, when the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> by using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果该元素是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>，可单击的点是可见的客户端区域的任何点<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>这将导致发出命令按钮表示，当用户单击<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>通过使用鼠标。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取描述与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 的功能的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The string that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 字符串，用于描述与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 的功能。

trans-unit.source: The string that is returned generally is the same text that is provided in the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: 通常，返回的字符串与控件的工具提示中提供的文本相同。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that conveys the visual status of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取传送与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 的可视状态的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the status.
trans-unit.target: 包含状态的字符串。

trans-unit.source: For example, the status of a messenger contact could be "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: 例如，messenger 联系人状态可能是"忙碌"或"联机"。

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable string that contains the type of the item that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可读字符串，该字符串包含与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 表示的项类型。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the item type.
trans-unit.target: 包含此项类型的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Examples are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".
trans-unit.target: 示例包括"邮件"、"联系人"和"文档"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> that is targeted to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" />，该标签的目标为与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> for the element that is targeted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> 所使用的元素的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> method could get the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果该元素是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>控件，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>方法无法获取<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>关联<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the notification characteristics of the live region of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 的活动区域的通知特征。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLiveSetting" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLiveSetting" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The notification characteristics of the live region.
trans-unit.target: 活动区域的通知特征。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 的文本标签。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: 包含标签的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: Name 属性可以看作是用户将用于说明所引用的控件的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: 务必要具有中的所有控件的文本表示形式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]以便你可以以编程方式引用到控件本地化的方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> is laid out in a specific direction.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 是否以特定方向布局。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation.None" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation.None" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 的控件模式。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider" /> interface if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider" />，则为实现 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> 接口的对象；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> currently has keyboard input focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 当前是否具有键盘输入点。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element has keyboard input focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素具有键盘输入点，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> is an element that contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 是不是一个包含提供给用户的数据的元素。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> is something that the end user would understand as being interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 被最终用户理解为交互式元素，还是理解为组成 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)] 中控件的逻辑结构的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this automation peer can receive and send events to the associated element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此自动化对等方是否可以接收事件并将事件发送到关联的元素。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the automation peer can receive and send events; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果自动化同级可以接收和发送事件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 是否可以接受键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> is off of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 是否不在屏幕上。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素不在屏幕上，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不指示元素是否可见。

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element can be on the screen but still not be visible, for example if the element is obscured by other elements.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，元素可以在屏幕上，但仍不可见，例如，如果此元素遮盖其他元素。

trans-unit.source: In this case the method would return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，此方法将返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> contains protected content.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 是否包含受保护的内容。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> is required to be filled out on a form.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否需要在表单上填写与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard input focus on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 对与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 设置键盘输入焦点。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" /> 调用。
